question.questiontextL:
Your team at the ECP is going to have two members conduct the initial entry into the building. The initial entry tasks are to perform a visual inspection of the area, assess dose rate, and identify isotopes present if possible.

To complete these tasks, which pieces of equipment will the initial entry team utilize?
question.questiontextM:
You are having two team members conduct the initial entry into the building. Your initial entry tasks are to perform a visual inspection of the area, assess dose rate, and identify isotopes present if possible.

To complete these tasks, which pieces of equipment will you utilize?
